sf-parent-children-0 sf-single-children-4 menuparent"><span>How You <br />Can Help</span><ul><li id="menu-30676-1" class="first odd sf-item-1 sf-depth-2 sf-no-children"><a href="/ways-to-give" title="" class="sf-depth-2">Ways to Give</a></li><li id="menu-28661-1" class="middle even sf-item-2 sf-depth-2 sf-no-children"><a href="/team-aspca" title="" class="sf-depth-2">Fundraise with Team ASPCA</a></li><li id="menu-28676-1" class="middle odd sf-item-3 sf-depth-2 sf-no-children"><a href="/take-action" title="" class="sf-depth-2">Take Action</a></li><li id="menu-28671-1" class="last even sf-item-4 sf-depth-2 sf-no-children"><a href="/adopt-pet" title="" class="sf-depth-2">Adopt a Pet</a></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>
<div id="block-menu-block-14" class="block block-menu-block even mobile_view_desktop_header mobile-menu" role="navigation">

        <h2 class="block__title block-title block-title">Primary Nav Menu</h2>
    
  <div class="menu-block-wrapper menu-block-14 menu-name-menu-primary-nav-menu parent-mlid-0 menu-level-1">
  <ul class="menu"><li class="menu__item is-expanded first expanded menu-mlid-28611"><span>Key Issues</span><ul class="menu"><li class="menu__item is-leaf first leaf menu-mlid-28691"><a href="/animal-homelessness" title="" class="menu__link sf-depth-2">Animal Homelessness</a></li>
<li class="menu__item is-leaf last leaf menu-mlid-30656"><a href="/animal-cruelty" title="" class="menu__link sf-depth-2">Animal Cruelty</a></li>
</ul></li>
<li class="menu__item is-expanded expanded menu-mlid-28626"><span>Our Response</span><ul class="menu"><li class="menu__item is-leaf first leaf menu-mlid-30661"><a href="/animal-rescue" title="" class="menu__link sf-depth-2">Animal Rescue</a></li>
<li class="menu__item is-leaf leaf menu-mlid-30666"><a href="/animal-placement" title="" class="menu__link sf-depth-2">Animal Placement</a></li>
<li class="menu__item is-leaf last leaf menu-mlid-30671"><a href="/animal-protection" title="" class="menu__link sf-depth-2">Animal Protection</a></li>
</ul></li>
<li class="menu__item is-expanded last expanded menu-mlid-28606"><span>How You Can Help</span><ul class="menu"><li class="menu__item is-leaf first leaf menu-mlid-30676"><a href="/ways-to-give" title="" class="menu__link sf-depth-2">Ways to Give</a></li>
<li class="menu__item is-leaf leaf menu-mlid-28661"><a href="/team-aspca" title="" class="menu__link">Fundraise with Team ASPCA</a></li>

</ul></li>
</ul></div>

  <div class="l-main-wrap">
    <div id="main" class="l-main l-container">

      <div id="content" role="main" class="l-content">
            <a id="main-content"></a>
            <div class="title-area ">
        <nav class="breadcrumb" role="navigation"><h2 class="element-invisible">You are here</h2><ol><li><a href="/pet-care">Pet Care</a> </li><li><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control">Animal Poison Control</a></li></ol></nav>                          <div class="title breadcrumbs">
			<h1 class="page__title title" id="page-title">Toxic and Non-Toxic Plant List - Cats</h1>
            		      </div>
                	  </div>
                              


<div class="panel-display panel-1col clearfix" >
  <div class="panel-panel panel-col">
    <div><div class="panel-pane pane-views-panes pane-all-plants-list-panel-pane-2" >
  
      
  
  <div class="view view-all-plants-list view-id-all_plants_list view-display-id-panel_pane_2 view-dom-id-d87b668fffc5309b353c49212f21aa33">
            <div class="view-header">
      <h2>Plants Toxic to Cats</h2>    </div>
  
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/adam-and-eve">Adam-and-Eve</a> (Arum, Lord-and-Ladies, Wake Robin, Starch Root, Bobbins, Cuckoo Plant) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Arum maculatum</i> | <b>Family:</b> Araceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/african-wonder-tree">African Wonder Tree</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Ricinus communis</i> | <b>Family:</b>  </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/alocasia">Alocasia</a> (Elephant&#039;s Ear) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Alocasia spp.</i> | <b>Family:</b> Araceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/aloe">Aloe</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Aloe vera</i> | <b>Family:</b> Liliaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-5 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/amaryllis">Amaryllis</a> (Many, including: Belladonna lily, Saint Joseph lily, Cape Belladonna, Naked Lady) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Amaryllis spp.</i> | <b>Family:</b> Amaryllidaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-6 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/ambrosia-mexicana">Ambrosia Mexicana</a> (Jerusalem Oak, Feather Geranium) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Chenopodium botrys</i> | <b>Family:</b> Chenopodiaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-7 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/american-bittersweet">American Bittersweet</a> (Bittersweet, Waxwork, Shrubby Bittersweet, False Bittersweet, Climbing Bittersweet) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Celastrus scandens</i> | <b>Family:</b> Celastraceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-8 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/american-holly">American Holly</a> (English Holly, European Holly, Oregon Holly, Inkberry, Winterberry) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Ilex opaca</i> | <b>Family:</b> Aquifoliaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-9 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/american-mandrake">American Mandrake</a> (Mayapple, Indian Apple Root, Umbrella Leaf, Wild Lemon, Hog Apple, Duck&#039;s Foot, Raccoonberry) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Podophyllum peltatum</i> | <b>Family:</b> Berberidaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-10 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/american-yew">American Yew</a> (Canada Yew, Canadian Yew) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Taxus canadensus</i> | <b>Family:</b> Taxaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-11 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/andromeda-japonica">Andromeda Japonica</a> (Pieris, Lily-of-the-Valley Bush) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Pieris japonica</i> | <b>Family:</b> Ericaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-12 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/angelica-tree">Angelica Tree</a> (Hercules&#039; Club, Devil&#039;s Walking Stick, Prickly Ash, Prickly Elder) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Aralia spinosa</i> | <b>Family:</b> Araliaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-13 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/apple">Apple</a> (Includes crabapples) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Malus sylvestrus</i> | <b>Family:</b> Rosaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-14 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/apricot">Apricot</a> (Group also includes Plum, Peach, Cherry) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Prunus armeniaca</i> | <b>Family:</b> Rosaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-15 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/arrow-head-vine">Arrow-Head Vine</a> (Nephthytis, Green Gold Naphthysis, African Evergreen, Trileaf Wonder) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Syngonium podophyllum</i> | <b>Family:</b> Araceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-16 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/arum">Arum</a> (Cuckoo-pint, Lord-and-Ladies, Adam-and-Eve, Starch Root, Bobbins, Wake Robin) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Arum maculatum</i> | <b>Family:</b> Araceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-17 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/arum-lily">Arum Lily</a> (Calla Lily, Pig Lily, White Arum, Trumpet Lily, Florist&#039;s Calla, Garden Calla) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Zantedeschia aethiopica</i> | <b>Family:</b> Araceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-18 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/asian-lily">Asian Lily</a> (Asiatic Lily) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Lilium asiatica</i> | <b>Family:</b> Liliaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-19 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/australian-ivy-palm">Australian Ivy Palm</a> (Schefflera, Umbrella Tree, Octopus Tree, Starleaf) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Brassaia actinophylla</i> | <b>Family:</b> Araliaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-20 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/autumn-crocus">Autumn Crocus</a> (Meadow Saffron) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Colchicum autumnale</i> | <b>Family:</b> Liliaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-21 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/azalea">Azalea</a> (Rosebay, Rhododendron) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Rhododendron spp</i> | <b>Family:</b> Ericaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-22 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/baby-doll-ti-plant">Baby Doll Ti Plant</a> (Ti-Plant, Good-Luck Plant, Hawaiian Ti Plant) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Cordyline terminalis</i> | <b>Family:</b> Agavaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-23 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/barbados-aloe">Barbados Aloe</a> (Medicine Plant, True Aloe) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Aloe barbadensis</i> | <b>Family:</b> Aloaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-24 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/barbados-lily">Barbados Lily</a> (Amaryllis, Fire Lily, Lily of the Palace, Ridderstjerne) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Hippeastrum spp.</i> | <b>Family:</b> Amaryllidaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-25 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/barbados-pride">Barbados Pride</a> (Peacock Flower, Dwarf Poinciana) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Caesalpinia pulcherrima</i> | <b>Family:</b>  </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-26 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/barbados-pride-2">Barbados Pride 2</a> (Bird of Paradise, Poinciana, Brazilwood) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Poinciana gilliesii</i> | <b>Family:</b> Leguminosae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-27 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/bay-laurel">Bay Laurel</a> (Sweet Bag, Bay Tree, Tree Laurel, Laurel Tree, Laurel) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Laurus nobilis</i> | <b>Family:</b> Lauraceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-28 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/bead-tree">Bead Tree</a> (China Ball Tree, Paradise Tree, Persian Lilac, White Cedar, Japanese Bead Tree, Texas Umbrella Tree, Pride-of-India, Chinaberry Tree) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Melia azedarach</i> | <b>Family:</b> Meliaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-29 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/begonia">Begonia</a> (Over 1,000 species and 10,000 hybrids) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Begonia spp.</i> | <b>Family:</b> Begoniaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-30 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/bergamot-orange">Bergamot Orange</a> (Bergamot, Citrus bergamia) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Citrus Aurantium</i> | <b>Family:</b> Rutaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-31 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/bird-paradise">Bird of Paradise</a> (Peacock Flower, Barbados Pride, Poinciana, Pride of Barbados) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Caesalpinia gilliesii</i> | <b>Family:</b> Leguminosae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-32 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/bird-paradise-2">Bird of Paradise 2</a> (Peacock Flower, Barbados Pride, Poinciana, Pride of Barbados) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Poinciana gilliesii</i> | <b>Family:</b> Leguminosae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-33 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/bird-paradise-flower">Bird of Paradise Flower</a> (Crane Flower, Bird&#039;s Tongue Flower) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Strelitzia reginae</i> | <b>Family:</b> Strelitziaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-34 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/birds-tongue-flower">Bird&#039;s Tongue Flower</a> (Bird of Paradise Flower, Crane Flower) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Strelitzia reginae</i> | <b>Family:</b> Strelitziaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-35 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/bishops-weed">Bishopâ€™s Weed</a> (Greater Ammi, False Queen Anne&#039;s Lace) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Ammi majus</i> | <b>Family:</b> Apiaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-36 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/bitter-root">Bitter Root</a> (Dogbane Hemp, Indian Hemp) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Apocynum androsaemifolium</i> | <b>Family:</b> Apocynaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-37 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/black-calla">Black Calla</a> (Solomon&#039;s Lily, Wild Calla, Wild Arum) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Arum palestinum</i> | <b>Family:</b> Araceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-38 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/black-cherry">Black Cherry</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Prunus serotina</i> | <b>Family:</b> Rosaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-39 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/black-laurel">Black Laurel</a> (Dog Hobble, Dog Laurel, Fetter Bush, Sierra Laurel) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Leucothoe spp.</i> | <b>Family:</b> Ericaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-40 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/black-nightshade">Black Nightshade</a> (Nightshade, Deadly Nightshade) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Solanum nigrum</i> | <b>Family:</b> Solanaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-41 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/bobbins">Bobbins</a> (Arum, Lord-and-Ladies, Adam-and-Eve, Starch Root, Wake Robin, Cuckoo Plant) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Arum maculatum</i> | <b>Family:</b> Araceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-42 views-row-even">

      <div class="attachment attachment-after">
      <div class="view view-all-plants-list view-id-all_plants_list view-display-id-attachment_2">
            <div class="view-header">
      <h2>Plants Non-Toxic to Cats</h2>    </div>
  
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/achira">Achira</a> (Canna, Arrowroot) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Canna edulis</i> | <b>Family:</b> Cannaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/acorn-squash">Acorn Squash</a> (Similar plants:pumpkin, zucchini) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Cucurbita pepo</i> | <b>Family:</b> Cucurbitaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/african-daisy">African Daisy</a> (Barberton Daisy, Veldt Daisy, Transvaal Daisy, Gerber Daisy) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Gerbera jamesonii</i> | <b>Family:</b> Compositae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/african-violet">African Violet</a> (Cape Marigold) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Saintpaulia spp.</i> | <b>Family:</b> Gesneriaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-5 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/algaroba">Algaroba</a> (Kiawe, Mesquite) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Prosopis limensis</i> | <b>Family:</b> Mimosaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-6 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/aluminum-plant">Aluminum Plant</a> (Watermelon Plant) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Pilea cadieri</i> | <b>Family:</b> Urticaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-7 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/alumroot">Alumroot</a> (Coral Bells, Heuchera) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Heuchera sanguinea</i> | <b>Family:</b> Saxifragaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-8 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/alyssum">Alyssum</a> (Alyssum varieties) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Alyssum spp.</i> | <b>Family:</b> Brassicaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-9 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/american-rubber-plant">American Rubber Plant</a> (Pepper Face, Baby Rubber Plant) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Peperomia obtusifolia</i> | <b>Family:</b> Pipericeae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-10 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/amur-maple">Amur Maple</a> (Maple, Amur) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Acer ginnala</i> | <b>Family:</b> Aceraceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-11 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/anthericum-comosum">Anthericum Comosum</a> (Ribbon Plant, Spider Plant, Spider Ivy) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Chlorophytum comosum</i> | <b>Family:</b> Liliaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-12 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/antirrhinum-multiflorum">Antirrhinum Multiflorum</a> (Withered Snapdragon) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Antirrhinum multiflorum</i> | <b>Family:</b> Scrophulariaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-13 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/arabian-gentian">Arabian Gentian</a> (Persian Violet, German Violet) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Exacum affine</i> | <b>Family:</b> Gentianaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-14 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/areca-palm">Areca Palm</a> (Golden Butterfly Palm, Cane Palm, Golden Feather Palm, Yellow Palm) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Dypsis lutescens</i> | <b>Family:</b> Palmae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-15 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/aregelia">Aregelia</a> (Crimson cup, Marbled fingernail,Blushing bromeliad, Ossifragi Vase, Miniature Marble plant) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Neoregalia spp.</i> | <b>Family:</b> Bromeliaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-16 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/artillery-plant">Artillery Plant</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Pilea microphylla</i> | <b>Family:</b> Urticaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-17 views-row-odd">

  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/variegated-wax-plant">Variegated Wax Plant</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Echeveria sp.</i> | <b>Family:</b>  </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-527 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/velvet-plant">Velvet Plant</a> (Velvet Plant, Royal Velvet Plant, Purple Velvet Plant, Purple Passion Vine) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Gynura aurantica</i> | <b>Family:</b> Asteraceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-528 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/venus-fly-trap">Venus Fly Trap</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Dionaea muscipula</i> | <b>Family:</b> Droseraceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-529 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/verona-fern">Verona Fern</a> (Bold Sword Fern, Nephrolepis Biserrata, Verona Lace Fern) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Nephrolepis biserrata</i> | <b>Family:</b> Dryopteridaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-530 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/verona-lace-fern">Verona Lace Fern</a> (Bold Sword Fern, Nephrolepis Biserrata, Verona Fern) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Nephrolepis biserrata</i> | <b>Family:</b> Dryopteridaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-531 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/vining-peperomia">Vining Peperomia</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Peperomia serpens variegata</i> | <b>Family:</b> Piperaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-532 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/violet-slipper-gloxinia">Violet Slipper Gloxinia</a> (Bright Eyes) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Sinningia speciosa</i> | <b>Family:</b> Gesneriaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-533 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/waffle-plant">Waffle Plant</a> (Purple Waffle Plant) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Hemigraphis exotica</i> | <b>Family:</b> Acanthaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-534 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/walking-anthericum">Walking Anthericum</a> (Ribbon Plant, Spider Plant, Spider Ivy) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Chlorophytum comosum</i> | <b>Family:</b> Liliaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-535 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/washington-hawthorn">Washington Hawthorn</a> (Haws, Pirliteiro, Red Hawthorn) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Crataegus species</i> | <b>Family:</b> Rosaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-536 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/water-hickory">Water Hickory</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Carya aquatica</i> | <b>Family:</b> Juglandaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-537 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/water-hyacinth">Water Hyacinth</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Eichhornia crassipes</i> | <b>Family:</b> Pontederiaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-538 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/watermelon-begonia">Watermelon Begonia</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Peperomia argyreia</i> | <b>Family:</b> Piperaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-539 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/watermelon-peperomia">Watermelon Peperomia</a> (Watermelon Begonia) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Peperomia argyreia</i> | <b>Family:</b> Piperaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-540 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/watermelon-pilea">Watermelon Pilea</a> (Watermelon Plant, Aluminum Plant) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Pilea cadieri</i> | <b>Family:</b> Urticaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-541 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/wax-plant">Wax Plant</a> (Hindu Rope Plant, Porcelain Flower) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Hoya carnosa &#039;krinkle kurl&#039;</i> | <b>Family:</b> Asclepiadaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-542 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/wax-rosette">Wax Rosette</a> (Maroon Chenille Plant, Painted Lady, Copper Rose, Blue Echeveria, Plush Plant) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Echeveria gilva</i> | <b>Family:</b> Crassulaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-543 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/weeping-bottlebrush">Weeping Bottlebrush</a> (Bottlebrush, Prickly Bottlebrush, Crimson Bottlebrush) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Callistemon species</i> | <b>Family:</b> Myrtaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-544 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/weeping-sargent-hemlock">Weeping Sargent Hemlock</a> (Many varieties) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Tsuga species</i> | <b>Family:</b> Pinaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-545 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/weisdornbluten">Weisdornbluten</a> (Haws, Pirliteiro, Red Hawthorn, Washington Hawthorn) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Crataegus species</i> | <b>Family:</b> Rosaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-546 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/west-indian-gherkin">West Indian Gherkin</a> (Goareberry Gourd, Gooseberry Gourd, Burr Gourd) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Cucumis anguria</i> | <b>Family:</b> Cucurbitaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-547 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/western-sword">Western Sword</a> (Sword Fern, Giant Holly Fern, Imbricate Sword Fern) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Ploystichum munitum</i> | <b>Family:</b> Polypodaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-548 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/white-edged-swedish-ivy">White Edged Swedish Ivy</a> (Creeping Charlie, Swedish Ivy) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Plectranthus australis</i> | <b>Family:</b> Pilea: Uriticaeae; Plectranthus: Lamiaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-549 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/white-ginger">White Ginger</a> (Butterfly Ginger, Cinnamon Jasmine, Garland Flower, Ginger Lily) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Hedychium coronarium</i> | <b>Family:</b>  </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-550 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/white-heart-hickory">White Heart Hickory</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Carya tomentosa</i> | <b>Family:</b> Juglandaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-551 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/whitman-fern">Whitman Fern</a> (Bold Sword Fern, Nephrolepis Biserrata, Verona Fern, Verona Lace Fern) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Nephrolepis biserrata</i> | <b>Family:</b> Dryopteridaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-552 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/wild-buckwheat">Wild Buckwheat</a> (Sulfur Flower, Umbrella Plant) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Eriogonium umbellatum</i> | <b>Family:</b> Polygonaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-553 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/wild-hyacinth">Wild Hyacinth</a> (Blue Dicks) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Dichelostemma pulchellum</i> | <b>Family:</b> Amaryllidaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-554 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/wild-lantana">Wild Lantana</a> (Sand Verbena, Prairie Snowball) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Abronia fragrans</i> | <b>Family:</b> Nyctaginaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-555 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/wild-sasparilla">Wild Sasparilla</a> (Sawbrier) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Smilax glauca</i> | <b>Family:</b> Liliaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-556 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/wild-strawberry">Wild Strawberry</a> (Strawberry) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Fragaria</i> | <b>Family:</b> Rosaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-557 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/willow-herb">Willow Herb</a> (Blooming Sally, Fire Weed) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Epilobium angustifolium</i> | <b>Family:</b> Onagraceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-558 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/windmill-palm">Windmill Palm</a> (Chusan Palm) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Trachycarpus fortunei</i> | <b>Family:</b> Palmea </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-559 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/winter-cattleya">Winter Cattleya</a> (Christmas Orchid) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Cattleya trianaei</i> | <b>Family:</b> Orchidaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-560 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/withered-snapdragon">Withered Snapdragon</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Anthirrhinum multiflorum</i> | <b>Family:</b> Schrophulariaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-561 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/woolflower">Woolflower</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Celosia cristata</i> | <b>Family:</b> Amaranthaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-562 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/yellow-bloodleaf">Yellow Bloodleaf</a> (Chicken Gizzard, Bloodleaf, Joseph&#039;s Coat) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Iresine herbstii</i> | <b>Family:</b> Amaranthaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-563 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/yellow-palm">Yellow Palm</a> (Golden Butterfly Palm, Cane Palm, Golden Feather Palm, Yellow Palm) | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Dypsis lutescens</i> | <b>Family:</b> Palmae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-564 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/yellow-flowered-gourd">Yellow-Flowered Gourd</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Cucurbita species</i> | <b>Family:</b> Cucurbitaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-565 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/yellowrocket">Yellowrocket</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Barbarea vulgaris</i> | <b>Family:</b> Brassicaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-566 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/yorba-linda">Yorba Linda</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Peperomia rotundifolia</i> | <b>Family:</b> Piperaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-567 views-row-odd">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/zebra-haworthia">Zebra Haworthia</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Haworthia fasciata</i> | <b>Family:</b> Liliaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-568 views-row-even">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/zinnia">Zinnia</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Zinnia species</i> | <b>Family:</b> Asteraceae </span>  </div>  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-569 views-row-odd views-row-last">
      
  <div class="views-field views-field-path">        <span class="field-content"><a href="/pet-care/animal-poison-control/toxic-and-non-toxic-plants/zucchini-squash">Zucchini Squash</a> () | <b>Scientific Names:</b> <i>Cucurbia pepo cv zucchini</i> | <b>Family:</b> Cucurbitaceae </span>  </div>  </div>
